0011000000000000 ; 00 03 00 Read x
0010000000010100 ; 02 02 20 Store x
0111000000011000 ; 04 07 24 Multiply 7
0010000000010110 ; 06 02 22 Store 7x
0001000000010100 ; 08 01 20 Load x
0111000000010100 ; 10 07 20 Multiply x
0110000000010110 ; 12 06 22 Subtract 7x
0101000000011010 ; 14 05 26 Add 20
0100000000000000 ; 16 04 00 Write
0000000000000000 ; 18 00 00 Stop
0000000000000000 ; 20 00 00 x
0000000000000000 ; 22 00 00 7x
